text: "Wasting Love" is a 1992 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the third single from their ninth studio album Fear of the Dark. It was only released in the Netherlands and in Spain. == Track listing == ;CD-Maxi Single ;7" Canada Single == References == Category:1992 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Wasting Love
